amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for subsidizing clean energy in China and India.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for "DE--FOA0000697: Sustainable Cities: Urban Energy Planning for Smart Growth in China and India".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Yoho amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Yoho.
